Question: CHERRY CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
CHERRY XTRFY

Product Highlights:

- MX 3.1 Keyboard with aluminum housing for stability, comfort, and noise reduction, featuring new CHERRY MX2A switches with improved actuation and 100 million keystroke lifespan, available in Q2 2024 for $129 MSRP
- M64 & M68 Mouse Series with enhanced grip, control, reduced weight, and improved performance, including Pro versions with 8000 Hz technology for low click latencies, priced at $99 for wireless models and $139 for Pro wireless variants, available in Q2 2024
- M50 Mouse Series offering ergonomic design, adjustable RGB illumination, and three connectivity options (wireless 2.4 GHz, Bluetooth, and wired mode) at prices ranging from $49 to $69, set for release in Q2 2024
- Ngale Microphone Series catering to gamers and streamers, featuring studio-grade audio quality, XLR/USB hybrid functionality, and standalone USB microphone with prices ranging from $109 to $189, expected to be available in Q2 2024
- GP5 Amnis Blue Edition Mousepads with smooth cloth surface, new artwork, and different sizing options (Medium, Large, and XL) priced from $17 to $43, anticipated for release in Q2 2024
Summary_cn:
CHERRY XTRFY

产品亮点：

- MX 3.1 键盘采用铝外壳，稳定舒适，噪音降低，搭载新的CHERRY MX2A开关，改善了触发和100百万次按键寿命，预计2024年第二季度上市，建议零售价129美元
- M64和M68鼠标系列提供增强的握持、操控、减轻重量和提升性能，包括Pro版本，具备8000 Hz技术，实现低点击延迟，无线款售价99美元，Pro无线款售价139美元，预计2024年第二季度上市
- M50鼠标系列设计符合人体工学，可调节RGB照明，提供无线2.4 GHz、蓝牙和有线模式三种连接选项，售价从49至69美元不等，计划于2024年第二季度发布
- Ngale麦克风系列专为游戏玩家和直播主设计，具备录音室级音质，XLR/USB混合功能，可独立使用的USB麦克风价格从109至189美元不等，预计2024年第二季度上市
- GP5 Amnis 蓝色版鼠标垫采用光滑织物表面，新艺术设计，有中号、大号和特大号不同尺寸选项，价格从17至43美元不等，预计2024年第二季度发布
